schema.name: deployments
schema.title: Deployments
schema.description: Table with device trap placements (deployments). Includes `deploymentID`, start, end, location and device setup information.

fields.name: deploymentID
fields.description: Unique identifier of the deployment.

fields.name: locationID
fields.description: Identifier of the deployment location.

fields.name: locationName
fields.description: Name given to the deployment location.

fields.name: latitude
fields.description: Latitude of the deployment location in decimal degrees, using the WGS84 datum.

fields.name: longitude
fields.description: Longitude of the deployment location in decimal degrees, using the WGS84 datum.

fields.name: coordinateUncertainty
fields.description: Horizontal distance from the given `latitude` and `longitude` describing the smallest circle containing the deployment location. Expressed in meters. Especially relevant when coordinates are rounded to protect sensitive species.

fields.name: deploymentStart
fields.description: Date and time at which the deployment was started. Formatted as an ISO 8601 string with timezone designator (`YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssZ` or `YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss±hh:mm`).

fields.name: deploymentEnd
fields.description: Date and time at which the deployment was ended. Formatted as an ISO 8601 string with timezone designator (`YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssZ` or `YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss±hh:mm`).

fields.name: setupBy
fields.description: Name or identifier of the person or organization that deployed the device.

fields.name: deviceID
fields.description: Identifier of the device used for the deployment (e.g. the device device serial number).

fields.name: deviceModel
fields.description: Manufacturer and model of the device. Formatted as `manufacturer-model`.

fields.name: devicePlatform
fields.description: The substrate to which the device is mounted.

fields.name: deviceDelay
fields.description: Predefined duration after detection when further activity is ignored. Expressed in seconds.

fields.name: deviceHeight
fields.description: Height at which the device was deployed. Expressed in meters. Not to be combined with `deviceDepth`.

fields.name: deviceDepth
fields.description: Depth at which the device was deployed. Expressed in meters. Not to be combined with `deviceHeight`.

fields.name: deviceTilt
fields.description: Angle at which the device was deployed in the vertical plane. Expressed in degrees, with `-90` facing down, `0` horizontal and `90` facing up.

fields.name: deviceHeading
fields.description: Angle at which the device was deployed in the horizontal plane. Expressed in decimal degrees clockwise from north, with values ranging from `0` to `360`: `0` = north, `90` = east, `180` = south, `270` = west.

fields.name: dutyCycle
fields.description: Description of the duty cycle settings

fields.name: detectionDistance
fields.description: Maximum distance at which the device can reliably detect activity. Expressed in meters. Typically measured by having a human move in front of the device.

fields.name: timestampIssues
fields.description: `true` if timestamps in the `media` resource for the deployment are known to have (unsolvable) issues (e.g. unknown timezone, am/pm switch).

fields.name: baitUse
fields.description: `true` if bait was used for the deployment. More information can be provided in `tags` or `comments`.

fields.name: featureType
fields.description: Type of the feature (if any) associated with the deployment.

fields.name: habitat
fields.description: Short characterization of the habitat at the deployment location.

fields.name: deploymentGroups
fields.description: Deployment group(s) associated with the deployment. Deployment groups can have a spatial (arrays, grids, clusters), temporal (sessions, seasons, months, years) or other context. Formatted as a pipe (`|`) separated list for multiple values, with values preferably formatted as `key:value` pairs.

fields.name: deploymentTags
fields.description: Tag(s) associated with the deployment. Formatted as a pipe (`|`) separated list for multiple values, with values optionally formatted as `key:value` pairs.

fields.name: deploymentComments
fields.description: Comments or notes about the deployment.

schema.name: media
schema.title: Media
schema.description: Table with media files (images/videos) recorded during deployments (`deploymentID`). Includes timestamp and file path.

fields.name: mediaID
fields.description: Unique identifier of the media file.

fields.name: deploymentID
fields.description: Identifier of the deployment the media file belongs to. Foreign key to `deployments.deploymentID`.

fields.name: captureMethod
fields.description: Method used to capture the media file.

fields.name: timestamp
fields.description: Date and time at which the media file was recorded. Formatted as an ISO 8601 string with timezone designator (`YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssZ` or `YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss±hh:mm`).

fields.name: filePath
fields.description: URL or relative path to the media file, respectively for externally hosted files or files that are part of the package.

fields.name: filePublic
fields.description: `false` if the media file is not publicly accessible (e.g. to protect the privacy of people).

fields.name: fileName
fields.description: Name of the media file. If provided, one should be able to sort media files chronologically within a deployment on `timestamp` (first) and `fileName` (second).

fields.name: fileMediatype
fields.description: Mediatype of the media file. Expressed as an [IANA Media Type](https://www.iana.org/assignments/media-types/media-types.xhtml).

fields.name: samplingFrequency
fields.description: Frequencies at which measurements are made. Expressed in Hertz.

fields.name: bitDepth
fields.description: Number of bits used to represent each sample in a digital audio file.

fields.name: gain
fields.description: Amplification of a signal. Expressed in decibels (dB).

fields.name: channels
fields.description: Index of an acoustic data stream within a recording.

fields.name: mediaDuration
fields.description: The playback duration of an audio or video file in seconds. This might be different from the time in seconds calculated as the difference of ac:endTimestamp and ac:startTimestamp if ac:mediaSpeed is not equal to 1.

fields.name: exifData
fields.description: EXIF data of the media file. Formatted as a valid JSON object.

fields.name: favorite
fields.description: `true` if the media file is deemed of interest (e.g. an exemplar image of an individual).

fields.name: mediaComments
fields.description: Comments or notes about the media file.

name: camtrap-dp-acoustic-example-dataset
title: The Sound of Norway: bird detections
bibliographicCitation: Bick, I. Avery, Vegar Bakkestuen, Benjamin Cretois, Ben Hillier, John A. Kålås, Marius Pedersen, Kiran Raja, et al. ‘National-Scale Acoustic Monitoring of Avian Biodiversity and Phenology’. Ecology, 24 May 2024. https://doi.org/10.1101/2024.05.21.595242

project.title: The Sound of Norway
project.description: The Sound of Norway project monitors ecosystems across the nation with real- time recording devices. Using machine learning to automatically classify bird vocalisations, we can simultaneously track the distribution and migration patterns of many species on vast scales and over long time-periods.
